meaniit.title: Meaniit
meaniit.description: AI solution service for practitioners in a specific industry, from research to drafting and completing reports

education.title: Education Service
education.description: Providing easy-to-understand AI and Digital Transformation (DX) online/offline education, seminars, and consulting

partners.title: We are already breaking down the challenges of the latest technology together.

timeline.title: The journey of challenging to make the not-so-easy continues.

events.title: Pilot Program Execution
events.body: Provided tailored trend briefing AI test participation for listed/large company practitioners and conducted AI improvements.

events.title: 'Research AI (Tentative)' Internal Testing
events.body: Service enhancement with GPT features for rapid information acquisition and easy summarization.

events.title: Establishment of GET-A Inc (formerly Easy Knowledge LLC)
events.body: Change in corporate structure (all members retained): LLC to Corporation.

events.title: 'Easy Explanation Platform' Beta Test
events.body: Second public test conducted after infrastructure optimization for large-scale use through AWS cloud services. (Market/Infra Test)

events.title: 'Easy Explanation Platform' Alpha Test
events.body: Minimum Viable Product (MVP) completed, followed by the first customer test for customer-oriented feature development.

events.title: Formation of Founding Members
events.body: Composed of four founding members, the team commenced full-scale service development with excellent development capabilities.

events.title: Initial Development of 'Easy Explanation Platform'
events.body: Started direct development of the MEANIIT item, which was initially just an idea.

text.first:
Anyone can easily and quickly
Conduct research and draft reports using AI technology.
text.second:
Simplify tasks, increase research volume, and never miss references.
Maximize your work efficiency.

differentiation.title: Differentiation
differentiation.subtitle:
What makes us
different from others?

items.title: Easy
items.subcontent: You need to start to move forward.

items.title: Short
items.content: The process must be short by default.
items.subcontent: 'Potentially useful features' are just complexity unless needed.

items.title: Accessible
items.content: We consider whether 'everyone' can access it easily.

items.title: Yours
items.content: We don't forget what users provide.
items.subcontent: If users give data, they deserve something in return.

howUse: What data to gather and what topic to write on
Just set it, and the report arrives via email

items.title: Enter Search Keywords
items.detail: Based on the entered search keywords, get related topics and additional keywords.

items.title: Set Period
items.detail: Decide how far back to analyze the data.

items.title: Enter Main Topic
items.detail: Write based on the researched materials with the given topic.

items.title: Enter Email
items.detail: Once the report is ready, it will be sent to the entered email.

items.title: AI Report Revision
items.detail: Request additional research or revisions, or edit it yourself.

meta.title: MEANIIT - AI Research Assistant
meta.description: Maximize your efficiency with AI that conducts research, drafts reports, and revises with feedback for additional research and corrections.
